title: NFT for Beginners
headline: Learn about the fundamentals of NFTs, how to navigate its marketplace and trade them safely in this free online course.
description: Non-fungible tokens (NFTs) are digital assets regarded as modern-day collectibles. They offer a variety of alternatives for creating and exchanging digital assets. Are you looking to dive into the exciting world of NFTs? This course will teach you the fundamentals of NFTs and blockchain technology and how to create and sell them on digital platforms. You'll also learn how to avoid scams on the NFT marketplace and more.
courseDescription:
Non-fungible tokens (NFT) are unique digital assets that allow creators to showcase their talents and creativity in the digital space. These cryptographic tokens are stored on a blockchain, making them one-of-a-kind and highly sought-after collectables. Understanding the blockchain technology which supports NFTs is crucial to grasp the potential of NFTs fully. Blockchain is a modern-day technology that stores data in blocks linked together in a chain. It supports NFTs such as artwork, music, virtual real estate and more. The combination of NFTs and blockchain technology revolutionises how we create, own, and trade digital assets. In this course, we'll teach you the fundamentals of NFTs, including how to create your own unique NFTs and sell them on digital platforms such as OpenSea, Nifty Gateway and more. Additionally, you'll learn how to navigate safely through the platforms and avoid scams.

We start by distinguishing between fungible and non-fungible tokens. We will also delve into the unique characteristics of NFTs and provide an overview of their history. NFTs are considered innovative and unique digital assets, and many misconceptions exist. We'll show you some of these fallacies and debunk them. You'll explore the types of blockchains, the structure of a blockchain and how NFTs and blockchain technology are interconnected. Following that, you'll learn about the Ethereum blockchain, Ethereum smart contracts, different NFT marketplaces and a few notable NFT projects. We'll also discuss the varieties of NFTs found on digital platforms. "If you suspect deceit, hit delete." Scammers are everywhere and are likely to be more in the digital space. We'll teach you about NFT security and standards, including smart contract vulnerabilities.

An NFT is created by converting a digital file into a digital asset that can be stored on a blockchain (known as minting). We'll show you how to develop and sell NFTs and the elements that must be decided before minting them. You'll learn how to buy cryptocurrencies for the gas fees required to list NFTs on digital platforms. You'll discover why you should invest in NFTs and how NFTs affect our future. NFTs are exponentially increasing in popularity because of their versatility. Since NFTs are integrated into blockchain technology, they are essential in businesses of various kinds because they increase transparency and reduce fraud. We have designed this course for all learners, including business owners, collectors and trade experts. The world is digitally advancing at an alarming rate. Don't be left in the dark.
